---
title: Upload Media
---

```typescript
import { whopApi } from "@/lib/whop-api";

const result = await whopApi.uploadMedia({
	// Required! Autogenerated input type of DirectUpload
	input: {
		byteSize: 10,
		// Represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Since the value may
		// exceed the size of a 32-bit integer, it's encoded as a string.
		byteSizeV2: "9999999",
		// Required!
		checksum: "some string",
		contentType: "some string",
		// Required!
		filename: "some string",
		metadata: { any: "json" },
		multipart: true,
		// Required! The types of records that an attachment can be attached to
		record:
			"abuse_report" /* Valid values: abuse_report | access_pass | app | automated_messages_config | bot | bounty | bounty_submission | competition_prize | content_reward_campaign | content_reward_submission | dispute | dms_post | experience | forum_post | resolution_event_upload | review | review_report | user */,
	},
});

```
